alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 1:40AM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches above 6000 feet and 8 to 14 inches above 7000 feet with up to 2 feet possible at the highest elevations. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 4 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on Highways 156, 157 and 158.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
